content.markdown:
Docs Home Page - Developer Docs - Gadget

# Gadget developer documentation

Learn the fundamentals of the Gadget framework with our guides. The guides will teach you core Gadget concepts, and show you how to build full-stack web apps with Gadget.

[![icon](https://docs.gadget.dev/.vite/assets/API-icon.b123f07d.svg)**Guides**\\
\\
Concepts and tutorials that show you how to build an app in Gadget.\\
\\
**View guides →**](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides) [![icon](https://docs.gadget.dev/.vite/assets/Docs.38167b83.svg)**Generated API**\\
\\
Detailed documentation on how to use your Gadget generated API.\\
\\
**View your API →**](https://docs.gadget.dev/api/example-app/development) [![icon](https://docs.gadget.dev/.vite/assets/Run-code-snippet.2e78bbbd.svg)**Reference**\\
\\
An overview of the variety of packages and tools for your Gadget application.\\
\\
**View the reference →**](https://docs.gadget.dev/reference)

![](https://t.co/1/i/adsct?bci=4&dv=America%2FLos_Angeles%26en-US%26Google%20Inc.%26Linux%20x86_64%26255%261280%26720%2648%2616%261280%26720%260%26na&eci=3&event=%7B%7D&event_id=94515312-2588-4c4f-9f90-c0301e95d4a8&integration=gtm&p_id=Twitter&p_user_id=0&pl_id=a435e15d-e4dc-4a09-87b5-0e70930062ae&pt=Docs%20Home%20Page%20-%20Developer%20Docs%20-%20Gadget&tw_document_href=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.gadget.dev%2F&tw_iframe_status=0&txn_id=o9df8&type=javascript&version=2.3.35)![](https://analytics.twitter.com/1/i/adsct?bci=4&dv=America%2FLos_Angeles%26en-US%26Google%20Inc.%26Linux%20x86_64%26255%261280%26720%2648%2616%261280%26720%260%26na&eci=3&event=%7B%7D&event_id=94515312-2588-4c4f-9f90-c0301e95d4a8&integration=gtm&p_id=Twitter&p_user_id=0&pl_id=a435e15d-e4dc-4a09-87b5-0e70930062ae&pt=Docs%20Home%20Page%20-%20Developer%20Docs%20-%20Gadget&tw_document_href=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.gadget.dev%2F&tw_iframe_status=0&txn_id=o9df8&type=javascript&version=2.3.35)

Guides - Developer Docs - Gadget

- [Getting started](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started)

  - [Quickstarts](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/quickstarts)

    - [Web quickstart](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/quickstarts/web-quickstart)

    - [Shopify quickstart](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/quickstart)

    - [BigCommerce quickstart](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/quickstarts/bigcommerce-quickstart)
  - [What is Gadget?](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/what-is-gadget)

  - [How to build a Gadget app](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/how-to-build-a-gadget-app)

  - [How is Gadget different from X](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/how-is-gadget-different-from-x)

  - [Tutorials](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials)

    - [Web apps](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/web-ai)

      - [OpenAI screenwriter](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/ai-screenwriter)
    - [Shopify](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/shopify)

      - [Build a full stack Shopify app](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/automated-product-tagger)

      - [Forward data to an external service](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/middleware)

      - [Building with Shopify UI extensions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/checkout-ui-extension)

      - [Building with Shopify theme app extensions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/shopify/theme-app-extensions)
    - [BigCommerce](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/bigcommerce)

      - [Automatically add search keywords to products](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/bigcommerce/product-search-keywords)

      - [Size charts for Catalyst storefronts](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/bigcommerce/size-charts)
    - [ChatGPT](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials/chatgpt/todo-list)
- [Models](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/models)

  - [Overview](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/models/overview)

  - [Fields](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/models/fields)

  - [Storing files](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/models/storing-files)

  - [Relationships](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/models/relationships)

  - [Namespaces](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/models/namespaces)
- [Actions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions)

  - [Overview](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/overview)

  - [Global and model-scoped actions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/types-of-actions)

  - [What's in an action?](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/code)

  - [Writing actions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/writing-actions)

  - [Background actions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/background)

  - [Triggers](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/triggers)

  - [Namespacing global actions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/namespacing-global-actions)

  - [Actions and API](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/actions/actions-and-api)
- [HTTP routes](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/http-routes)

  - [Route structure](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/http-routes/route-structure)

  - [Route configuration](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/http-routes/route-configuration)

  - [Common use cases](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/http-routes/common-use-cases)
- [Data access](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/data-access)

  - [API access to data](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/data-access/api)

  - [Computed fields](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/data-access/computed-fields)

  - [Computed views](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/data-access/computed-views)

  - [Gelly](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/data-access/gelly)
- [Frontends](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend)

  - [Building frontends](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/building-frontends)

  - [Building with Remix](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/remix-in-gadget)

  - [Building with React Router](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/react-router-in-gadget)

  - [Building with Tailwind CSS](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/building-with-tailwind)

  - [Autocomponents](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/autocomponents)

    - [Polaris](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/autocomponents/polaris)

    - [Shadcn](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/autocomponents/shadcn)
  - [Forms](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/forms)

  - [Realtime queries](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/realtime-queries)

  - [Sharing code between the frontend and backend](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/shared-code)

  - [External frontends](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/external-frontends)

  - [Optimize LCP](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/frontend/optimize-lcp)
- [Templates](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/templates)

- [Access control](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/access-control)

- [Plugins](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins)

  - [Shopify](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify)

    - [Connecting to Shopify](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/quickstarts)

    - [Building Shopify apps](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/building-shopify-apps)

    - [Working with webhooks](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/shopify-webhooks)

    - [Syncing](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/syncing-shopify-data)

    - [Frontends](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/frontends)

    - [Embed previews](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/embed-previews)

    - [Advanced topics](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics)

      - [Data security](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/data-security)

      - [Metafields & metaobjects](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/metafields-metaobjects)

      - [OAuth](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/oauth)

      - [Billing](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/billing)

      - [shopify.app.toml files](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/shopify-app-toml)

      - [Building extensions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/extensions)

      - [Customer account UI extensions & authentication](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/advanced-topics/customer-account-ui-extensions)
    - [API version changelog](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/shopify/api-version-changelog)
  - [BigCommerce](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/bigcommerce)

    - [BigCommerce webhook subscriptions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/bigcommerce/webhooks)

    - [Working with BigCommerce data](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/bigcommerce/data)

    - [Building single-click app frontends](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/bigcommerce/frontends)

    - [Building App Extensions](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/bigcommerce/app-extensions)

    - [Integrate with Catalyst storefronts](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/bigcommerce/catalyst)
  - [OpenAI](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/openai)

    - [Building with OpenAI](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/openai/building-ai-apps)

    - [Building ChatGPT Apps](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/openai/building-chatgpt-apps)
  - [Sentry](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/sentry)

  - [Authentication](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/authentication)

    - [Helpers](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/authentication/helpers)

    - [Workflows](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/authentication/workflows)

    - [Building with Google OAuth](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/authentication/google-oauth)

    - [Building with email/password](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/authentication/email-pass)

    - [Removing default authentication methods](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/authentication/remove-default-auth-methods)
  - [Extending Gadget](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/plugins/extending-gadget)
- [Environments](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/environments)

  - [Deployment](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/environments/deployment)

  - [Set up a CI/CD pipeline](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/environments/ci-cd)

  - [Custom domains](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/environments/custom-domains)

  - [Development pausing](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/environments/development-pausing)
- [Source control](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/source-control)

- [Development tools](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools)

  - [AI assistant](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/ai-assistant)

    - [Features](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/ai-assistant/features)

    - [Prompt guide](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/ai-assistant/prompt-guide)
  - [Logger](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/logger)

  - [ggt - the Gadget CLI](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/cli)

  - [Environment variables](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/environment-variables)

  - [Terminal](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/terminal)

  - [TypeScript support](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/typescript-support)

  - [Unit testing](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/unit-testing)

  - [Framework linter](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/framework-linter)

  - [Rate limits](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/rate-limits)

  - [Runtime environment](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/runtime-environment)

  - [Operations dashboard](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/operations-dashboard)

  - [Debugging & profiling](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/debugging-and-profiling)

  - [Keyboard shortcuts](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/development-tools/keyboard-shortcuts)

  - [Account and billing](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/account-and-billing)

* * *

[Gadget framework](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/gadget-framework)

[Changelog](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/changelog)

[Glossary](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/glossary)

[FAQ](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/faq)

## Learn how to build with Gadget

Learn the fundamentals of the Gadget framework with our guides. The guides will teach you core Gadget concepts, and show you how you can compose them to build full-stack web apps.

[**Quickstart**\\
\\
Get started in Gadget and build a sample application.\\
\\
**Build an app →**\\
\\
![](https://docs.gadget.dev/.vite/assets/isometric-code-icon.79fd9cd5.svg)](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/getting-started/quickstarts/web-quickstart) [**Tutorials**\\
\\
Learn how to build through a series of interactive tutorials.\\
\\
**Learn more →**\\
\\
![](https://docs.gadget.dev/.vite/assets/isometric-browser-window.376931a4.svg)](https://docs.gadget.dev/guides/tutorials)

##### Looking for something else?
